snippet: In the third book in his trilogy devoted to self-improvement, A. J. Jacobs aims to get physically fit.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Drop Dead Healthy: One Man's Humble Quest for Bodily Perfection by A J Jacobs.
lead_paragraph: In the third book in his trilogy devoted to self-improvement, A. J. Jacobs aims to get physically fit.

headline.seo: In ‘Drop Dead Healthy,’ A. J. Jacobs Gets Relentlessly Fit
headline.main: A Not-Quite-Young Man With a Plan Follows a Type-A Pursuit of Health
headline.print_headline: A Not-Quite-Young Man With a Plan Follows a Type-A Pursuit of Health
